name: rarime
tech_stack: ['Poseidon (hash function - variants: Poseidon2, Poseidon3, Poseidon5)', 'SHA-256', 'RSA signature verification', 'ECDSA signature verification', 'Sparse Merkle Trees (SMT)', 'Circom (ZK circuit compiler)', 'SnarkJS']
privacy_techniques: ['SNARKs (Succinct Non-interactive Arguments of Knowledge)', 'Groth16 protocol (implied via Circom/SnarkJS ecosystem)', 'PLONK support (via SnarkJS compatibility)', 'Client-side proving', 'ZK Rollup technology']
['Self-Sovereign Identity (SSI)', 'Decentralized Identity (DID)', 'ERC-7812 ZK Identity Registry', 'ICAO passport signature validation', 'NFC-based biometric passport verification']

['Zero-knowledge credential verification', 'Prove identity without revealing personal data', 'Privacy-preserving proof of: age, uniqueness, nationality', 'Sparse Merkle Tree state management', 'Active authentication (anti-impersonation)', 'Secure credential storage with biometric locks']

['Hash-based commitments (Poseidon hashing)', 'Merkle tree proofs', 'Sparse Merkle Tree (SMT) for identity state', 'Zero-knowledge proof generation and verification', 'Public key cryptography binding (passport ↔ identity)']
